text: Gudenå (pronounced Goo-den-o) is the longest river in Denmark. It is long.http://www2.dmu.dk/1_viden/2_publikationer/3_fagrapporter/rapporter/fr340.pdf The river starts at a spring called Tinnet Krat. It flows through Jutland. It is useful for both canoeing and birdwatching. title: Gudenå
